version_description:
• Improved notification center: We’ve redesigned the notifications and warnings within the Nuki app.
• From now on you will also get a notification outside the Nuki app when the batteries of a Smart Lock are nearly depleted.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

You want to help us make Nuki even better and be the first to try out the latest features? Then become part of the Nuki Beta program! Go to www.nuki.io/beta

Fixes a problem with Smart Notifications for doors with a knob.

Love Nuki? Write us an App Store review!

You want to help us make Nuki even better and be the first to try out the latest features? Then become part of the Nuki Beta program! Go to www.nuki.io/beta

New features in combination with Smart Lock firmware 1.4.5:
• Now you can schedule lock actions at specific times of the day (e.g. automatically lock your door at 10pm every day)*
• The button actions on the Smart Lock are now configurable*
• The Lock ‘n’ Go time can be reduced*
• The activity log does now display all motor driven actions like calibration and position detection*
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

* Requires Smart Lock firmware version 1.4.5

Love Nuki? Write us an App Store review!

You want to help us make Nuki even better and be the first to try out the latest features? Then become part of the Nuki Beta program! Go to www.nuki.io/beta
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

• iOS 11 compatibility
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Auto Unlock enhancements
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Auto Unlock enhancements
• Performance improvements and bug fixes
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• The Nuki app is now available in further languages: Italian, Spanish, Czech, Slovak.
• Performance and stability improvements
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• We’ve beautified the Nuki app to support the iPhone X
• Enhanced app menu design with new categories
• Usability optimizations in the Smart Action Center
• Auto Unlock improvements for users with multiple Smart Locks in the app
• Usability optimizations in the welcome szenario
• The app now displays when the Smart Lock performs a calibration or position detection
• New app icons for iPad and Apple Watch
• Various bug fixes

• This update contains highspeed performance improvements, to make the communication between the Nuki products a lot faster. For example, for iOS 11 users the Smart Lock firmware update will work up to 6 times faster than before!
• Now you can configure the unlatch time for opening doors with a knob. This new feature requires the new Smart Lock firmware version 1.5.3.
• Auto Unlock optimizations
• Bug fixes

• This update contains highspeed performance improvements, to make the communication between the Nuki products a lot faster. For example, for iOS 11 users the Smart Lock firmware update will work up to 6 times faster than before!
• Now you can configure the unlatch time for opening doors with a knob. This new feature requires the new Smart Lock firmware version 1.5.3, which will be rolled out staggered during the next days.
• Auto Unlock optimizations
• Bug fixes

• Auto Unlock optimizations
• Performance improvements and bug fixes
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Improved Nuki Bridge management: We have redesigned the Bridge management and made lots of usability optimizations to improve the setup and management of the Bridge.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Brand new Fob management for the new Nuki Fob
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

• NEW: The Auto Lock feature locks your door after an adjustable period of time.*
• NEW: With the Smart Lock tuning guide you get the most out of your door lock.
• NEW: Optimize locking feature, for even faster locking actions.
• Auto Unlock improvements
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

* Requires the Smart Lock firmware version 1.6.2 (or higher).
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Improved Nuki app for Apple Watch. Now you can open your door even faster and more reliably with Apple Watch.
• Fixes a bug that could have caused the firmware update for your Smart Lock to fail.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Privacy policy update: Please read and agree to the privacy policy to use the Nuki app.
• Increased password security: The Nuki app now requires a stronger password when activating Nuki Web.
• Fixes an error in the visualization of time-limited access permissions.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes
Performance improvements and bug fixes
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• New in-app notification to remind you to wake your phone from sleep mode, for improving the quality of Auto Unlock.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• New in-app notification to remind you to wake your phone from sleep mode, for improving the quality of Auto Unlock.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Auto Unlock & Smart Notifications bug fixes and improvements.
• Fixes firmware update problems with Smart Lock 1.0.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes

The Nuki app is packed with new features:
• The Auto Unlock feature has been structurally reworked and works more reliably now.
• Nuki now supports Siri Shortcuts. You can configure individual Shortcuts to perform frequently used locking actions with voice commands. For security reasons, Siri Shortcuts are only executed within Bluetooth range of the Smart Lock. Enable Siri Shortcuts in the Nuki app menu > Siri Shortcuts.
• Nuki is now available for the new watch complications on the Apple Watch Series 4.
• Support for our new Nuki Keypad.
• Fixes a bug where the Nuki status ring was not displayed correctly under iOS 12.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• Auto Unlock & Smart Notifications bug fixes and improvements.
• Fixes firmware update problems with Smart Lock 1.0.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• Corrects a bug in the display of activity log entries.
• Auto Unlock & Smart Notifications bug fixes and improvements.
• Fixes firmware update problems with Smart Lock 1.0.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• Auto Unlock improvements.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

New and better than ever!
• From now on when you tap on your Smart Lock, you will see the suggested locking actions. With a swipe gesture upwards you can see further actions. With a swipe downwards it all disappears.
• New interface for the Apple Watch. Now you immediately have the locking actions available to quickly open your door.
• The main view and controls of the Nuki app have been optimized for use with VoiceOver.
• Auto Unlock improvements.
• Various bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• From now on the "Open door" button is available for all users. Before it was hidden for doors with a handle on the outside.
• The warning when trying to use "open door" from more than 1 km away has been refactored and is now also shown in the Watch app.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Fixes a bug that occurred when redeeming a Nuki Box invitation code.
• Performance improvements and further minor bug fixes.

• NEW: Direct locking via Apple Watch. If the iPhone is not connected to the Apple Watch or can not connect to the Smart Lock, the Nuki Watch App does now lock or unlock directly via Bluetooth. You can see that the watch app operates in independent mode when no Smart Lock state is displayed before or after a lock command.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes

• Support for the new Nuki Opener.
• In order to make the Nuki app even easier for you to use, we have redesigned the app menu and the device management.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• NEW: Push notifications. Nuki can send you notifications when activities are being performed with your electronic door lock, or when there are important warnings. Activate it in the device settings > Manage Smart Lock > Manage notifications.
• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• Performance improvements and bug fixes.

• NEW: Night mode. During the selected period, the energy saving mode of the Smart Lock is activated and the door is locked twice. Controls Auto Lock and Auto Unlock actions.
Activate it in the device settings > Manage Smart Lock > Night mode.
(available with Smart Lock 1.0 from Firmware 1.8.0 and Smart Lock 2.0 from Firmware 2.6.2)
